{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Hey, can we do a Come Alive check-in today? What's the process, and how do we do it?", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}
{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:43:07.966218+00:00', 'content_type': 'real_time_user_audio_video_asset_pointer', 'frames_asset_pointers': [], 'video_container_asset_pointer': None, 'audio_asset_pointer': {'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:43:07.966218+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_00000000eb3c62309c10dcd3a73d0ef3', 'size_bytes': 238638, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 4.97}}, 'audio_start_timestamp': 7.5502472770167515}

{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:46:38.095559+00:00', 'content_type': 'real_time_user_audio_video_asset_pointer', 'frames_asset_pointers': [], 'video_container_asset_pointer': None, 'audio_asset_pointer': {'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:46:38.095559+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_000000004378623083148828aa2f37bd', 'size_bytes': 6578958, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 137.06}}, 'audio_start_timestamp': 192.46019678999437}
{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Yeah, also, like, you know what we've been chatting about for, like, the last forever, and I'm wondering, am I forgetting something? Like, could you tell me what I need to be doing? I have a friend, Muffin, visiting. I finished the majority of my work that I have to do today, so I'm kind of free now. But of course, like, because I did some work, now my brain is, like, revving on work. It's like, oh, I could have done this better. You know, maybe I could improve this or something like that. And I never feel like I'm done, you know, like I've done my job good enough or something like that. And in terms of energy, I'm trying this dexamethamine thing and instead of Adderall. It's good. I don't feel it. I guess it's good. I don't know if it's helping me focus. I don't know if I should take more. Like, I took five grams maybe three hours ago, and I'm trying to, like, you know, I have a new doctor in Belgium who is my therapist, psychiatrist, and so he's giving me this stuff. The experiment in five milligrams is pretty low. I used to take 20 milligrams of Adderall. I don't know if there's, like, an equivalency thing, so I can try to get something that maybe feels similar. And what else? Yeah, I did this letter to my brother thing because my brother got into a fight with my other brother, and I wanted to be a part of my family and help. And I tried my best, and I wrote this letter, and I sent it to my dad, but I didn't really have a lot of time to follow up to see if he actually did it. And I kind of am nervous about it. It's like a scary thing to do, this family intervention. I know family interventions generally all fail or have problems, so I'm wondering if I should just not do anything. I don't know. So, I have a friend here I haven't seen in a long time, and I'm excited to have him here. And I'm going out for some mushrooms, and I'll be coming back soon, I think, home because it's almost lunchtime. And energy levels, I'd say, it's like a 3.5. I don't have that same kind of, like, energy, the high energy, high pitch feeling energy I might have when I am a four on Adderall, but it's okay.", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Thanks for sharing all that! Let's break it down a bit and see what can help you come alive today.

From what you said, it sounds like you've wrapped up most of your work, which is great! Even though your mind’s still buzzing about how to improve things, it’s okay to let yourself step back and recharge. Remember, you’ve done enough for today, and it’s important to acknowledge that.

Your energy level at around a 3.5 is a good indicator that some lighter, more enjoyable activities might help you recharge. Spending time with your friend and going out for mushrooms could be a perfect way to shift gears and get some fresh energy.

About the family intervention: it’s natural to feel nervous about it. You took a brave step by writing that letter. Sometimes these things take time, and it’s okay to give yourself some grace. You’ve done what you can, and that’s enough for now.

For your Come Alive check-in today, how about this: let’s make your meaningful action something simple and fulfilling. Maybe it’s enjoying the time with your friend without any work thoughts creeping in. Or perhaps it’s taking a few moments to reflect on what you’ve accomplished this week and give yourself some credit.

How does that sound?", 'direction': 'out', 'decoding_id': None}
{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:46:38.095671+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_0000000070486230a8dfded74a7c2ad5', 'size_bytes': 3292878, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 68.6}}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "I don't really understand. You want me to do what?", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}
{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:47:17.424906+00:00', 'content_type': 'real_time_user_audio_video_asset_pointer', 'frames_asset_pointers': [], 'video_container_asset_pointer': None, 'audio_asset_pointer': {'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:47:17.424906+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_0000000026546230849c4a891ed83c30', 'size_bytes': 233838, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 4.87}}, 'audio_start_timestamp': 272.38065530202584}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': 'No worries! Let me clarify. The idea is to pick one small, meaningful action for today that aligns with what makes you feel alive and connected. It could be something as simple as fully enjoying the time with your friend without letting work thoughts intrude, or taking a moment to acknowledge what you’ve already accomplished this week and feel good about it.\n\nIt’s about focusing on a single, intentional step that feels meaningful to you, even if it’s small. Does that make more sense?', 'direction': 'out', 'decoding_id': None}
{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:47:17.425028+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_00000000ed406230a2330f87bd852987', 'size_bytes': 1365678, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 28.45}}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Yeah, but do you have any, like, actual ideas? Like, things to do? Or, like, what? Like, being there with my friend isn't really clear for me.", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}
{'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:48:12.367200+00:00', 'content_type': 'real_time_user_audio_video_asset_pointer', 'frames_asset_pointers': [], 'video_container_asset_pointer': None, 'audio_asset_pointer': {'expiry_datetime': '2025-11-28T09:48:12.367200+00:00', 'content_type': 'audio_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'sediment://file_00000000ad386230b15d0b740668bca8', 'size_bytes': 507438, 'format': 'wav', 'metadata': {'start_timestamp': None, 'end_timestamp': None, 'pretokenized_vq': None, 'interruptions': None, 'original_audio_source': None, 'transcription': None, 'word_transcription': None, 'start': 0, 'end': 10.57}}, 'audio_start_timestamp': 314.72748849802883}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Yeah, how about you ask me some questions so that you can give me an activity that is actually more aligned with what might be fun for me and my friend. I've known him since 2008 and we have been a part of our lives for like a long time. I used to live together with him when we both were interns at Instructables and yeah, I think it's like, you know, we've been through a lot together and I think it's interesting to think of what could be fun. He's definitely a creative, fun guy, very, I was thinking we can fix the bikes together. I don't know, like acts of service, because like it's a bunch of things I want to do for my family, but I don't have generally time for. So I think maybe taking advantage of having him around to help with the baby and stuff, but it's not exactly like fun, you know, like it's work.", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}
